title: Can You Find Out Who Viewed Your Threads Profile?

steps.title: Threads does not show you who has viewed your profile.
steps.content: Threads does not show you who has viewed your profile. Likewise, other users cannot see if you have viewed their profile. This is to protect the privacy of other users. While it may be useful for you to know who has viewed your profile, other users may not want you to know. It may even discourage them from viewing your profile. If you are worried about what other people might see on your Threads profile, don't share any information you don't want others to know about. While Threads doesn't show who viewed your profile, it does show who is following you, and who has liked, commented, shared, or quoted your Threads posts. You can use this information to make an educated guess as to who has viewed your profile.

steps.title: If you have a public profile, anybody can see your profile or your posts.
steps.content: If you have a public profile, anybody can see your profile or your posts. However, if your account is set to private, only those following you can view your profile or your threads. This is also true for your Instagram profile .

steps.title: Tap your profile icon in the Threads app.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon in the Threads app. It's the person icon at the lower-right corner of Threads.

steps.title: Tap the Settings icon.
steps.content: Tap the Settings icon. It's the two lines in the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Privacy in the Settings menu.
steps.content: Tap Privacy in the Settings menu. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the toggle switch next to "Private profile."
steps.content: Tap the toggle switch next to "Private profile." This sets your Threads profile to private. Now the only people who can view your Threads profile are those who follow you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: It is unlikely that third-party apps can show who has viewed your profile.
steps.content: It is unlikely that third-party apps can show who has viewed your profile. You may have seen some apps that claim to be able to show you who has viewed your profile on Threads. It is unlikely these apps work, and it is strongly recommended that you do not use them, as they may endanger your account. Providing your Threads or Instagram log-in information to a third-party app can compromise your account and result in your Threads or Instagram account getting hacked. Using a third-party app to see who has viewed your profile is also against Threads' privacy policy and may result in your account getting banned.
